title: "Major Strategic Mistake": Iran Blasts EU After Guards' Terror Designation
summary_full: Iran reacted with fury on Thursday after the EU blacklisted the country's Revolutionary Guards as a terror group, as Tehran faced off with Washington after US President Donald Trump warned time was running out for a nuclear deal.
